entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as dead by Harry. The text states that Harry saw his body.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: Patronus is a magical creature that can take different forms. Dumbledore's Patronus was specifically mentioned to be a phoenix.

entities.name: phoenix
entities.description: Phoenix is the form of Dumbledore's Patronus.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as an example of someone whose Patronus changed.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a character in the conversation who questions Dumbledore's death.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone to whom Dumbledore left an old Snitch.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: Snitch is a magical object that was left by Dumbledore for Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: The sword is mentioned as something that Dumbledore could have given to the characters if he were alive.

relationships.description: Dumbledore left an old Snitch for Harry and Hermione.
Ron questions why Dumbledore wouldn't give them the sword if he were alive.
Hermione is mentioned as someone to whom Dumbledore left an old Snitch.
